metadata.name: The Sculpture 1
metadata.description:
Title: The Sculpture  
Artist: Godwits  
Year: 2023  
Smart Contract By: Manifold  
Artist Royalty: 7.5%  

The Sculpture is a collection of abstract minimalist sculptures created with the combination of machine intelligence, 3D & design software by Godwits. Zoom in close to the piece and youâ€™ll see massive layers of abstract shapes stacked in detail to form an overall form when you zoom out.  

Each work explores the concept of weightlessness and freedom. The interaction of the shapes creates a sense of movement and fluidity, evoking the feeling of floating in the vast emptiness of space. The simplicity of the forms and the use of colors gives the piece a sense of timelessness and universality, inviting the viewer to contemplate the vastness of the universe and the human relationship to it.  

Limited to personal non-commercial use and resale rights of NFT are granted.  
All other terms & rights are reserved to Abstract Art Labs LLC
